main event: A round-shaped object, primarily orange in color, was observed accelerating to a great speed while diminishing in size before going out of view.
interesting points: The object was described as appearing to explode, emitting spark-like particles before disappearing and then briefly reappearing.
The observers reported the object appeared to move slowly while coming in a northerly direction.
The object went dark, with sparks trailing, and lighted fragments fell up before the light slowly faded out.
One of the observers thought they saw a black object fall towards the ground.
sighted object: round-shaped object, primarily orange in color
